com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class SoundRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.SoundRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaRecorder.OnErrorListener, MediaRecorder.OnInfoListener, Component

    public final class SoundRecorder
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, MediaRecorder.OnErrorListener, MediaRecorder.OnInfoListener
    Multimedia component that records audio using MediaRecorder.
